practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Wrongful Death|Trucking Accidents|Brain Injury|Birth Injury
description:
With over 30 years of experience, the law office of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys is here to represent those in Eugene, Oregon, when it comes to matters of bankruptcy and personal injury. We take a thorough, kind approach to solving complicated financial matters and rebuilding lives that have been in financial chaos for too long. Not only do we offer free initial consultations to potential clients, but we also provide complimentary credit rebuilding.

We represent those in the Tri-County area of Washington and throughout the state of Oregon in matters of Chapter 7, Chapter 11, Chapter 12 and Chapter 13 bankruptcies. Those facing credit harassment from credit-reporting agencies, mortgage companies, collection agencies, credit unions and banks also benefit from our creative, customized approach to bankruptcy law. Harassing collection calls and mounting debt can seriously affect quality of life, and we are advocates who aid our business and individual clients with solutions that work for them.

Along with legal matters of bankruptcy, the law office of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys also handles cases of personal injury, especially those related to motor vehicle accidents, wrongful death, trucking accidents, brain injuries and birth injuries. Life changes significantly when an unexpected injury or accident occurs, and our goal is to obtain adequate compensation to cover medical bills, repair costs and loss of income for those who suffered injury from another's negligence.

Our law office takes a caring, honest, candid approach to every case we handle for the people of Eugene, Oregon. We are always realistic with our clients, answer emails seven days a week and accept credit card payments in office.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
